summary: The Voluntary Public Access Improvement Act of 2025 aims to reauthorize the voluntary public access and habitat incentive program. It amends the Food Security Act of 1985 by allocating $150,000,000 from the Commodity Credit Corporation for the period of fiscal years 2025-2029.  A portion of this funding, $3,000,000, is specifically designated to encourage public access to land with wetland reserve easements through agreements with states and tribal governments.
